title: Nichijou: Nichijou no 0-wa
ending_song: "Nichijou no 0-wa (日常の 0 話)" by Sayaka Sasaki
sinopse: While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for.
